Up.Statement: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM w2_OrderExtendStatusSetting WHERE extend_status_no = '45') BEGIN UPDATE w2_OrderExtendStatusSetting SET shop_id = '0', extend_status_name = '【システム使用】注文内容変更済みフラグ', date_changed = GETDATE(), last_changed = 'W2ユーザー' WHERE extend_status_no = '45'; END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO w2_OrderExtendStatusSetting (shop_id,extend_status_no, extend_status_name, date_created, date_changed, last_changed) VALUES ('0','45', '【システム使用】注文内容変更済みフラグ', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'W2ユーザー'); END
